players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I discovered last night."
You: "Bob's claim of innocence seems suspicious."
Bob: "I'd like to remind everyone that I have an alibi for the night of Diana's death. I was seen by several villagers in the town square during that time."
You: "Bob, your alibi doesn't necessarily clear you of suspicion. Charlie's silence is also suspicious."
